tum.dss.thesis

Interface SeparationOracleInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSeparationOracle, SeparationOracle

    public interface SeparationOracleInterface
    Interface for the separation oracle.
    Author:
    Florian Stallmann

    • Method Detail

      • setData

        void setData(EllipsoidMethodData data)
        Dependency injection: sets data and initializes variables.
        Parameters:
        data - special data for ellipsoid method.

      • ask

        boolean ask(Vector<FloatingPoint> wz)
        Ask oracle whether given point (valuation vector) is in polytope.

        This method will call the approximation algorithm and add new integer solutions via EllipsoidMethodData.addIntegerSolution(int[], int). It will also perform all the mapping needed to call the algorithm. To retrieve the correct cut the ellipsoid method will either call getConstraintCut or getObjectiveCut.

        Parameters:
        wz - valuation vector.
        Returns:
        true if point in polytope, false otherwise.

      • getConstraintCut

        Vector<FloatingPoint> getConstraintCut()
        Gets the constraint cut as vector.
        Returns:
        constraint cut.

      • getObjectiveCut

        Vector<FloatingPoint> getObjectiveCut()
        Gets the objective cut as vector.
        Returns:
        objective cut.

      • getGammaValue

        FloatingPoint getGammaValue()
        Gets the gamma value for the deep cut.

        Note that this method might be obsolete as the LS framework always uses the gamma value 1. However, the method has been kept to make it easy to adjust this value for future experiments. For example, using the objective value or an arbitrary value other than 1 might improve the runtime.

        Returns:
        gamma.

      • lastWzWasAskedBefore

        boolean lastWzWasAskedBefore()
        This method returns true if the vector of wz that was used for the last call of the ask method was already asked before.
        Returns:
        true if wz is a duplicate, otherwise false.

      • lastWzWasNewSolution

        boolean lastWzWasNewSolution()
        This method returns true if the vector wz that was used for the last call of the ask method lead to a new integer solution.
        Returns:
        true if new solution was found and it is not a duplicate, otherwise false.

      • retrieveIntegerSolution

        int[] retrieveIntegerSolution()
        Methods which is called to retrieve integer solution.

        This method needs to be implemented for the specific mechanism, e.g. a greedy algorithm for the knapsack problem.

        Returns:
        integer array with integer solution.

      • getIntegralityGap

        double getIntegralityGap()
        Gets the integrality gap of the oracle respectively the approximation algorithm.
        Returns:
        integrality gap alpha.

      • setObjectiveAsGamma

        void setObjectiveAsGamma(boolean deep_gamma)
        Sets if the objective value should be used as gamma value for the deep cut.
        Parameters:
        deep_gamma - true if objective value should be used as gamma.
